verses.verse: וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-Lach sent יְהוֹשֻׁ֣עַ־ <S%H3091><s%> ye-ho-Shu-a'- And Joshua בִּן־ <S%H1121><s%> bin- the son נ֠וּן <S%H5126><s%> nun of Nun מִֽן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הַשִּׁטִּ֞ים <S%H7851><s%> hash-shit-Tim out of Shittim שְׁנַֽיִם־ <S%H8147><s%> she-na-yim- two אֲנָשִׁ֤ים <S%H376><s%> 'a-na-Shim men מְרַגְּלִים֙ <S%H7270><s%> me-rag-ge-Lim to spy חֶ֣רֶשׁ <S%H2791><s%> Che-resh secretly לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, saying לְכ֛וּ <S%H1980><s%> le-Chu Go רְא֥וּ <S%H7200><s%> re-'U view אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz the land וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et יְרִיח֑וֹ <S%H3405><s%> ye-ri-Cho; even Jericho וַיֵּ֨לְכ֜וּ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-le-Chu went וַ֠יָּבֹאוּ <S%H935><s%> Vai-ya-vo-'u and came בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> beit- the house אִשָּׁ֥ה <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah ess זוֹנָ֛ה <S%H2181><s%> zo-Nah into an harlot's וּשְׁמָ֥הּ <S%H8034><s%> u-she-Mah named רָחָ֖ב <S%H7343><s%> ra-Chav Rahab וַיִּשְׁכְּבוּ־ <S%H7901><s%> vai-yish-ke-vu- and lodged שָֽׁמָּה׃ <S%H8033><s%> Sham-mah. there

וַיֵּ֣אָמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> vai-Ye-'a-Mar, And it was told לְמֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> le-Me-lech the king יְרִיח֖וֹ <S%H3405><s%> ye-ri-Cho of Jericho לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold אֲ֠נָשִׁים <S%H582><s%> 'A-na-shim men בָּ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> Ba-'u Behold there came הֵ֧נָּה <S%H2008><s%> Hen-nah here הַלַּ֛יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> hal-Lay-lah in hither to night מִבְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> mib-be-Nei of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel לַחְפֹּ֥ר <S%H2658><s%> lach-Por to search out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. the country

וַיִּשְׁלַח֙ <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-Lach sent מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech And the king יְרִיח֔וֹ <S%H3405><s%> ye-ri-Cho, of Jericho אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to רָחָ֖ב <S%H7343><s%> ra-Chav unto Rahab לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying ה֠וֹצִיאִי <S%H3318><s%> Ho-tzi-'i Bring forth הָאֲנָשִׁ֨ים <S%H376><s%> ha-'a-na-Shim the men הַבָּאִ֤ים <S%H935><s%> hab-ba-'Im that are come אֵלַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H413><s%> 'e-La-yich to you אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- who בָּ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> Ba-'u to thee which are entered לְבֵיתֵ֔ךְ <S%H1004><s%> le-vei-Tech, into thine house כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לַחְפֹּ֥ר <S%H2658><s%> lach-Por to search out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz all the country בָּֽאוּ׃ <S%H935><s%> Ba-'u. for they be come

וַתִּקַּ֧ח <S%H3947><s%> vat-tik-Kach took הָֽאִשָּׁ֛ה <S%H802><s%> ha-'ish-Shah And the woman אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שְׁנֵ֥י <S%H8147><s%> she-Nei the two הָאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <S%H376><s%> ha-'a-na-Shim men וַֽתִּצְפְּנ֑וֹ <S%H6845><s%> vat-titz-pe-No; and hid וַתֹּ֣אמֶר׀ <S%H559><s%> vat-To-mer them and said כֵּ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> Ken, after that בָּ֤אוּ <S%H935><s%> Ba-'u thus There came אֵלַי֙ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai about הָֽאֲנָשִׁ֔ים <S%H376><s%> ha-'a-na-Shim, the men וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo did not יָדַ֖עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da'-ti unto me but I wist מֵאַ֥יִן <S%H370><s%> me-'A-yin not whence הֵֽמָּה׃ <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah. like

וַיְהִ֨י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came הַשַּׁ֜עַר <S%H8179><s%> hash-Sha-'ar of the gate לִסְגּ֗וֹר <S%H5462><s%> lis-Gor, And it came to pass [about the time] of shutting בַּחֹ֙שֶׁךְ֙ <S%H2822><s%> ba-Cho-shech when it was dark וְהָאֲנָשִׁ֣ים <S%H376><s%> ve-ha-'a-na-Shim the men יָצָ֔אוּ <S%H3318><s%> ya-Tza-'u, went out לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo not יָדַ֔עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da'-ti, I wot אָ֥נָה <S%H575><s%> 'A-nah where הָלְכ֖וּ <S%H1980><s%> ha-le-Chu went הָֽאֲנָשִׁ֑ים <S%H376><s%> ha-'a-na-Shim; the men רִדְפ֥וּ <S%H7291><s%> rid-Fu not pursue מַהֵ֛ר <S%H4118><s%> ma-Her them quickly אַחֲרֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-rei-Hem after כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for תַשִּׂיגֽוּם׃ <S%H5381><s%> tas-si-Gum. for ye shall overtake

וְהִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hi she הֶעֱלָ֣תַם <S%H5927><s%> he-'e-La-tam But she had brought them up הַגָּ֑גָה <S%H1406><s%> hag-Ga-gah; to the roof וַֽתִּטְמְנֵם֙ <S%H2934><s%> vat-tit-me-Nem of the house and hid בְּפִשְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H6593><s%> be-fish-Tei of flax הָעֵ֔ץ <S%H6086><s%> ha-'Etz, them with the stalks הָעֲרֻכ֥וֹת <S%H6186><s%> ha-'a-ru-Chot which she had laid in order לָ֖הּ lah עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on הַגָּֽג׃ <S%H1406><s%> hag-Gag. upon the roof

וְהָאֲנָשִׁ֗ים <S%H376><s%> ve-ha-'a-na-Shim, the men רָדְפ֤וּ <S%H7291><s%> ra-de-Fu pursued אַֽחֲרֵיהֶם֙ <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-rei-Hem after דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> De-rech them the way הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <S%H3383><s%> hai-yar-Den, to Jordan עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al unto הַֽמַּעְבְּר֑וֹת <S%H4569><s%> ham-ma'-be-Rot; unto the fords וְהַשַּׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> ve-hash-Sha-'ar the gate סָגָ֔רוּ <S%H5462><s%> sa-Ga-ru, they shut אַחֲרֵ֕י <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei after כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher them יָצְא֥וּ <S%H3318><s%> ya-tze-'U them were gone out הָרֹדְפִ֖ים <S%H7291><s%> ha-ro-de-Fim and as soon as they which pursued אַחֲרֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-rei-Hem. after that

וְהֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> ve-Hem-mah like טֶ֣רֶם <S%H2962><s%> Te-rem now before יִשְׁכָּב֑וּן <S%H7901><s%> yish-ka-Vun; And before they were laid down וְהִ֛יא <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hi she עָלְתָ֥ה <S%H5927><s%> 'al-Tah she came up עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Hem up עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- to הַגָּֽג׃ <S%H1406><s%> hag-Gag. unto them upon the roof

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for שָׁמַ֗עְנוּ <S%H8085><s%> sha-Ma'-nu, For we have heard אֵ֠ת <S%H853><s%> 'et אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- how הוֹבִ֨ישׁ <S%H3001><s%> ho-Vish dried up יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh how the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מֵ֤י <S%H4325><s%> mei the water יַם־ <S%H3220><s%> yam- sea סוּף֙ <S%H5488><s%> suf of the Red מִפְּנֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-nei-Chem, for you בְּצֵאתְכֶ֖ם <S%H3318><s%> be-tze-te-Chem when ye came out מִמִּצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> mi-mitz-Ra-yim; of Egypt וַאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> va-'a-Sher and what עֲשִׂיתֶ֡ם <S%H6213><s%> 'a-si-Tem and what ye did לִשְׁנֵי֩ <S%H8147><s%> lish-Nei unto the two מַלְכֵ֨י <S%H4428><s%> mal-Chei kings הָאֱמֹרִ֜י <S%H567><s%> ha-'e-mo-Ri of the Amorites אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who בְּעֵ֤בֶר <S%H5676><s%> be-'E-ver that [were] on the other side הַיַּרְדֵּן֙ <S%H3383><s%> hai-yar-Den Jordan לְסִיחֹ֣ן <S%H5511><s%> le-si-Chon Sihon וּלְע֔וֹג <S%H5747><s%> u-le-'og, and Og אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whom הֶחֱרַמְתֶּ֖ם <S%H2763><s%> he-che-ram-Tem whom ye utterly destroyed אוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H853><s%> o-Tam.
